text: Yuriy Andriyovych Mozharovskyi (Ukrainian: Юрій Андрійович Можаровський, born 2 October 1976 in Lviv, Ukraine) is a Ukrainian professional football referee. He has been a full international for FIFA since 2011.FIFA. title: Yuriy Mozharovskyi
